description: TestScript example resource with setup to delete if present and create a new instance of a Observation then update that Observation to create a minimum history; and single test definition to get the history of that Observation with various asserts.

name: TestScript Example History Observation
description: TestScript example resource with setup to delete if present and create a new instance of a Observation then update that Observation to create a minimum history; and single test definition to get the history of that Observation with various asserts.
purpose: Observation (Conditional) Create, Update, Delete and History (Instance) Operations

link.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

capability.description: Observation Update, Delete and History (Instance) Operations

operation.label: SetupDeleteObservation
operation.description: Execute a delete operation to insure the Observation does not exist on the server.

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK) or 204(No Content).

operation.label: SetupCreateObservation
operation.description: Create Observation resource on test server using the contents of fixture-observation-create

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 201(Created).

operation.label: SetupUpdateObservation
operation.description: Update Observation resource on test server using the contents of fixture-observation-update

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).

test.name: History Observation
test.description: Get the history for a known Observation and validate response.

operation.description: Get the Observation history on the test server using the id from fixture-observation-create.

assert.description: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type equals 'history'.
